thread.section_title: Novotel Roma Eur - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: perfect location for a short time stay
thread.title_full: perfect location for a short time stay - Review of Novotel Roma Eur, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Bartolomea B
title: perfect location for a short time stay
text:
If you arrive to Rome Fiumicino airport and you do not have much time, it's a perfect location. Rooms are nice, clean but not big. Breakfast very simple but good. Nice bar for an Italian aperitivo!
Perfect for business, family and friends.
